steps.processorData:
select
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0002]/value/value as AssessmentDate,
    a/context/start_time/value as CreatedDate,
    e/ehr_id/value as ehr_id,
    e/ehr_status/subject/external_ref/id/value as mrn,
    e/ehr_status/subject/external_ref/namespace as authority
from EHR e contains
top 1
COMPOSITION a
contains EVALUATION a_a[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.suspected_covid19_assessment.v0]
where a/archetype_details/template_id/value='Suspected COVID19 Assessment'
order by CreatedDate desc
offset 0 limit 100
